content: more 22 sts increase row increase in first st moss st to last st increase in last st work 15 row k 23 row next row moss st to end next row k2 skpo k to last 4 sts k2 decrease k2 next row k2 skpo k to last 4 sts k2 decrease k2 repeat the last 2 row once more and the increase row again 21 sts next row p to end next row k to end work 19 row next row k2 skpo k to last 4 sts k2 decrease k2 18 repeat the last 2 row twice more 16 sts next row skpo moss st to last 2 sts k2 decrease next row p to end leave these sts on a holder next row moss st to end leave these sts on a holder back repeat the last 2 row twice more 15 sts back with right side facing pick up and k16 sts along cast on edge leave these sts on a holder with right side facing pick up and k18 sts along cast on edge work as given for front from ** to ** back work as given for front from ** to ** with right sides facing cast off sts together with right side facing pick up and k15 sts along cast on edge with right sides again feet make 24 next row p2 decrease patt to last 2 sts p2 decrease front next row p to end with 2 75mm us 2 needles and c cast on 4 sts with 3 25mm us 3 needles and m leaving a long end next row c cast on 6 sts increase row increase in first st c4b p1 k1 p1 c8b p1 k1 p1 c4f increase in with right sides facing cast off sts together k 8 row last st 26 sts cast off work in cable patt face make 6
